revised_title: Hybridization and Morphological Relations in Echinoid Larvae
tldr: The author conducted experiments on hybridization between different species of echinoids, studying the morphological relations between parent forms and their hybrid progeny. They determined the proportion of fertilized ova and the number of plutei formed after eight days of development. The study provides insights into the transmission of parental characteristics and prepotency in evolution.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Developmental Biology
